pr_title: Add integ test for queue rejection cluster RCA

timeline.message: Add integ test for queue rejection cluster RCA

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we can use the TEST_RESOURCES_DIR in Consts.java and add on top of that ?
timeline.author: yojs

replies.bodyText: done, break the full path into smaller pieces and move the common part into Conts.java
replies.author: rguo-aws

timeline.bodyText: setTestApi() is an optional method. You can define this, if you want access to the TestApi object. As in this case we are not using that, maybe we can skip this and the class member  private TestApi api; ?
timeline.author: yojs

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we can change the name to something more indicative of what this is testing ?
timeline.author: yojs

timeline.bodyText: Integration tests can become complicated and sometimes it might be good to add doc comments stating what scenarios we are testing and what are the expectations ?
timeline.author: yojs

replies.bodyText: added comments on top to explain what this integ test does
replies.author: rguo-aws
